CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Style
abstract public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Style
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Styles.​HTMLStyle

The base class for all output styles.

Functions
Contains
abstract public bool Contains (
Path file
)

Returns whether this style contains the passed file.

MakeRelative
abstract public Path MakeRelative (
Path file
)

Converts the passed filename to one relative to this style.  If this style doesn't contain the file, it will return null.

IsSameFundamentalStyle
public virtual bool IsSameFundamentalStyle (
Style other
)

Returns whether this style is fundamentally the same as the passed one, meaning any identifying properties will be the same (i.e. both referencing the same style folder) but secondary properties may be different.
